article_metadata.news-keywords: marco rubio, senator, florida, donald trump, hilton head island, beaufort county, bluffton, politics, south carolina, primary, election, presidential, race, candidate, front-runner, leading, republican, democrat, obama, clinton
article_metadata.description: Presidential contender Marco Rubio shied away from taking on Republican front-runner Donald Trump during a campaign stop on Hilton Head Island Saturday.
